description:
Correction on bars 4 and 20 (needed change to proper timing)
Correction in bars 9 to 12 in the bass part, it was tabed with the wrong notes and tempo.
Added the palmutes from bar 13 to 16 on the guitar 
Correction on the guitar riff from bar 17 to 20
title: Beauty And The Beast
